text: Me uari akuvazɨ kɨ kamaghɨn me mɨgei, “Ia bar fo, en gumazamizitaba, ikɨzir igharazimɨn pura ingangarir gumazir kɨnibar ikɨtɨma, e ua me givezɨsɨ pamtem ingar, dagɨar rurir dafabar amuam. Ezɨ datɨrɨghɨn, ia uan namakaba paza me gamua, me ataghizɨ, me pura ingangarir gumazamizir kɨnibar mɨn iti, ezɨ me e givesi.” Kɨ kamaghɨn me mɨgeima, gumazir dapaniba nɨmɨra ikia akatam ikarazir puvatɨ.
